name: no-guard

effect.black_white: Due to a glitch, moves affected by this ability have a (100 - accuracy)% chance to hit through detect or protect.
effect.black_2_white_2: Due to a glitch, moves affected by this ability have a (100 - accuracy)% chance to hit through detect or protect.

short_effect: Ensures all moves used by and against the Pokémon hit.

flavor_text.black_white: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.
